channel.title: copying on C.O.M.
channel.description: Recent content in copying on C.O.M.

item.title: CFP: Festival of Derivatives
item.description: Call for proposals: Festival of Derivatives Deadline: 15 Nov 2022 Submit your proposal Festival information: 7 Dec 2022 7.00–8.30 pm CET/CAT Online event Register here View the Festival details Copies and derivatives are everywhere. Culture would not be without people duplicating, adapting and creating ripoffs of existing material. Yet at the same time paywalls and extractive licensing schemes do much work to block off copying. And somehow certain works are still labelled ‘original’, and it’s generally only those supposed ‘originals’ that get prized.

item.title: The Festival of Derivatives (7 Dec 2022, online event)
item.description: A festival celebrating all things original and copy.
